sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-form @submit.prevent="onSubmit"
    v-if="platformFee != null">
    <v-card>
      <v-row dense>
        <v-col
          :cols="7"
          dense
          @click="showFees = !showFees">
          <v-card class="pa-2">
            {{platformFee.description}}
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          :cols="4"
          dense
          @click="showFees = !showFees">
          <v-card class="pa-2">
            Total Fees: {{platformFee.platform_fee_total_fees | toCurrency2DP}}
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          v-if="showFees"
          @click="expandFees = !expandFees"
          :cols="1">
          <v-card>
            <v-btn color="primary">
              <v-icon v-if="!expandFees">
                mdi-plus
              </v-icon>
              <v-icon v-if="expandFees">
                mdi-minus
              </v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <template v-if="showFees">
        <v-row  v-for="item in filteredItems(platformFee)" :key="item[1].value" dense>
          <v-col dense :cols="6">
            <v-card class="pa-2" dense>

                {{ item[0] }}
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col v-if="item[2] != null" dense :cols="4">
            <v-currency-field
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model="platformFee[item[1]]"
              prefix="$"
            />
          </v-col>
          <v-col v-if="item[2] != null" dense :cols="2">
            <v-text-field
              dense solo hide-details
              :value = "getPercentage(item, platformFee)"
              @input = "setPercentage($event, item, platformFee)"
              suffix="%"
            />
          </v-col>
          <v-col v-else-if="item[1] != 'sliding_admin_fee'" dense :cols="6">
            <v-currency-field
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model="platformFee[item[1]]"
              prefix="$"
            />
          </v-col>
          <v-col v-else dense   :cols="5">
            <v-currency-field
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model="platformFee[item[1]]"
              prefix="$"
            />
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            :cols="1"
            v-if="item[1]=='sliding_admin_fee'">
            <ModifyTierFees
              :platformFee="platformFee"
              :platform="platform"
            />
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row dense v-if="template==true">
          <v-col dense :cols="6">
            <v-text-field
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model="platformFee.description"
              label="Description"
            />
          </v-col>
          <v-col dense:cols="6">
            <v-text-field
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model="platformFee.fee_group_order"
              label="Fee group order"
            />
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row dense v-if="template==true">
          <v-col dense :cols="6">
            <v-select
              dense solo hide-details
              :multiple="true"
              :items="AFSLList"
              item-value="id"
              item-text="name"
              v-model="platformFee.AFSL_limitation"
              label="AFSL Limitation"
            />
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row
          v-for="item in displayAdminItems"
          :key="item[0].value"
          dense>
          <v-col
            :cols="6"
            dense
          >
            <v-card
              class="pa-2">
              {{ item[1] }}
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            :cols="6"
            dense>
            <v-text-field
              v-if="item[3] === 'string' || item[3] == 'number' "
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model="platformFee[item[0]]"
            />
            <v-checkbox
              v-if="item[3] === 'boolean'"
              dense solo hide-details
              v-model="platformFee[item[0]]"
            />
            <v-select
              v-if="item[3] === 'list'"
              :items="getReadableList(item)"
              @change="convertToRealName(item, $event)"
              :value="convertLongName(item)"
              solo dense
              hide-details
            ></v-select>
          </v-col>
          </v-row>
      </template>
      <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" v-if="showFees">
        Save
      </v-btn>
    </v-card>
  </v-form>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
import ModifyTierFees from "@/components/ModifyTierFees.vue";

export default {
  name: "PlatformFeeSummary",
  inject: {
    platformId: { default: null },
    scenarioId: { default: null },
  },
  props: {
    platformFee: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
    platform: {
      type: Number,
      required: false,
    },
    template: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
    }
  },
  components: {
    ModifyTierFees,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      error: null,
      showFees: false,
      expandFees: false,
      AFSLList: [],
      displayItems: [
          ["Sliding admin fee","sliding_admin_fee",null],
          ["Administration fee (flat)","admin_fee_dollar", null],
          ["Administration fee (floating)","admin_fee_percentage_calculated", "admin_fee_percentage"],
          ["Expense recovery fee (flat)","expense_recovery_dollar", null],
          ["Expense recovery fee (floating)", "expense_recovery_percentage_calculated", "expense_recovery_percentage"],
          ["ORR Levy", "ORR_levy_calculated", "ORR_levy"],
          ["Fund accounting fee (flat)", "fund_accounting_fee_dollar", null],
          ["Fund accounting fee (floating)","fund_accounting_fee_percentage_calculated","fund_accounting_fee_percentage"],
          ["Trustee fee","trustee_fee_calculated", "trustee_fee"],
          ["Issuer fee", "issuer_fee_calculated", "issuer_fee"],
          ["SMA admin fee", "sma_admin_fee", null],
        ],
        displayAdminItems: [
          //format is ["field name", "friendly name", "editable by", "type", "tooltip"]
          ["fee_group_order","Fee group order","admin","number",null],
          ["admin_fee_structure", "Admin fee structure","admin","list", null],
          ["admin_fee_rebate", "Admin fee rebate", "admin", "number", null],
          ["cash_fee", "Cash fee", "admin", "number", null],
          ["switch_fee", "Switching fee", "admin", "number", null],
          ["minimum_admin_fee", "Minimum admin fee", "admin", "number", null],
          ["maximum_admin_fee", "Maximum admin fee", "admin", "number", null],
          ["minimum_total_fee", "Minimum total fee", "admin", "number", null],
          ["maximum_total_fee", "Maximum total fee", "admin", "number", null],
          ["admin_fee_exclusions", "Admin fee exclusions", "admin", "list", null],
        ],
    };
  },
  computed: {
    selectPlatformID: function() {
      if (this.platform == null) {
        return this.platformId;
      } else {
        return this.platform;
      }
    },
  },
  methods: {
    getReadableList(item){
      let list = this.platformFee[this.joinList(item[0])];
      let cleanList = [];
      for (let i=0; i<list.length; i++) {
        cleanList.push(list[i][1]);
      }
      return cleanList
    },
    convertLongName(item){
      let list = this.platformFee[this.joinList(item[0])];
      let realName = "";
      for (let i=0; i<list.length; i++) {
        if (this.platformFee[item[0]] == list[i][0]) {
          realName = list[i][1];
        }
      }
      return realName;
    },
    convertToRealName(item, event){
      let list = this.platformFee[this.joinList(item[0])];
      let realName = "";
      for (let i=0; i<list.length; i++) {
        if (event == list[i][1]) {
          realName = list[i][0];
          this.platformFee[item[0]] = realName;
        }
      }
    },
    joinList(item){
      return item.concat("_list");
    },
    filteredItems(feeItem){
      if (this.expandFees) {
        return this.displayItems;
      } else {
        return this.displayItems.filter(i => feeItem[i[1]] > 0);
      };
    },
    setPercentage(event, item, fee) {
      this.platformFee[item[1]] = event / 100 * fee.platform_fee_total;
      this.platformFee[item[2]] = event / 100;
    },
    getPercentage(item, fee) {
      return (fee[item[2]]*100)
    },
    getAFSLList(){
      if (this.template==true)  {
        let endpoint = `/api/afsls/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "GET").then(data => {
          this.AFSLList = data.results;
        });
      };
    },
    onSubmit() {
      let endpoint = null;
      if (this.template===true) {
        endpoint = `/api/platformtemplates/${this.platform}/fees/${this.platformFee.id}/`
      } else {
        endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.selectPlatformID}/platformfees/${this.platformFee.id}/`;
      }
      apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", this.platformFee).then(data => {
        this.$emit("modify-fees", data);
      });
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getAFSLList();
  }
};
</script>
